sentences.english: This makes it harder for forgeries to be made, " the bank explained at the time."
sentences.chinese: 這爲僞造增加了難度，”英格蘭銀行當時這樣解釋。

sentences.english: He also denied that the Bank had lost touch with reality.
sentences.chinese: 他還對英格蘭銀行脫離實際的說法進行了否認。

sentences.english: The Bank also deals in the foreign exchange market.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭銀行還參與外匯市場的交易。

sentences.english: 1946 - The Bank of England is nationalised.
sentences.chinese: 1946年的今天，英格蘭銀行國有化。

sentences.english: Then, the bank of England appeared.
The Bank of England will have five of its executives on the FPC.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭銀行將在金融政策委員會擁有五位執行官。

sentences.english: The Bank of England issued the million pound notes.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭銀行發行了一張百萬英鎊的鈔票。
